line: The twists and turns knock me out for a second. I find myself laying on soft grass after waking up.
There's a beautiful garden around me, dimly illuminated by fireflies and lamp poles. The air is fresh and fragrant, and the hole I just fell out of is nowhere to be found.
There's also a two-floor mansion quite a bit away.
It seems like it's night, but I can neither see the moon nor any stars.
I get up and see a fountain in a clearing ahead.
